column2: Sea Creatures Out Of Nowhere

Strange creatures set fin in our seas today, having sailed on unusual ships, and tried to gain an audience. They arrived with gifts and unusual goods that no one had ever seen. None of the courtiers understood their strange, melodious language, but it seems that they wanted to buy land for themselves in exchandge for they goods. Rejected, they seem to have become desperate and quickly set off, heading for a strange mist in the midst of the still currents, from which they appear to have arrived.
I have a bad feeling about this...
Sea Creatures Out Of Nowhere

There are rumors of strange creatures mooring among the many oceans and trying to buy land from local rulers in exchange for unusual goods. Being rejected over and over again, they become more and more desperate, clearly planning to get what they want by force.
Hah! - Only Dolphins can be sentient.
Invasion From Sea Creatures
A huge fleet emerged from the fog of the sea. Countless legions of warriors in shining armor set fin in our seas, and lined up in battle formations, began to march towards our cities and castles!
[This.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] have Mercy!

Thousands of strange ships arrived to the seas, spewing out countless legions of strange warriors in shinig armor stepped ashore. It is not known where they came from, for their appearance and language are not described anywhere in our scriptures, and some believe that these foreigners came from another ocean...

Thousands of strange ships arrived to the seas, spewing out countless legions of strange warriors in shinig armor stepped ashore. It is not known where they came from, for their appearance and language are not described anywhere in our scriptures, and some believe that these foreigners came from another ocean...

Thousands of strange ships arrived to the seas, spewing out countless legions of strange warriors in shinig armor stepped ashore. It is not known where they came from, for their appearance and language are not described anywhere in our scriptures, and some believe that these foreigners came from another ocean...
[This.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] have Mercy!

There are rumors that hunters have seen strange coral gates in the reefs, that have appeared out of nowhere. It is unknown who was able to build them unnoticed in such a short time, and many believe that they were placed here by magic. The gates are closed most of the time, but witnesses said they saw strange, stunted and bearded people coming out of them and quickly returned back if they were noticed.
This is definitely not good...
A Gates In The Reefs

There are rumors that hunters have seen strange coral gates in the reefs, that have appeared out of nowhere. It is unknown who was able to build them unnoticed in such a short time, and many believe that they were placed here by magic. The gates are closed most of the time, but witnesses said they saw strange, stunted and bearded people coming out of them and quickly returned back if they were noticed.
Nothing bad probably going to happen this time, right?
So the Khazuk have escaped too...
The Orca Invasion

Thousands of warriors, armed with spears and axes, began to descend from the reefs, emerging from the mysterious coral gates. It seems that these mysterious creatures came with the help of magic from the same ocean as the other strange creatures ravaging the seas of other oceans...
[This.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] have Mercy!

Thousands of warriors, armed with spears and axes, began to descend from the reefs, emerging from the mysterious coral gates. It seems that these mysterious creatures came with the help of magic from the same ocean as the other strange creatures ravaging the seas of other seas...

Thousands of warriors, armed with spears and axes, began to descend from the reefs, emerging from the mysterious coral gates. It seems that these mysterious creatures came with the help of magic from the same ocean as the other strange creatures ravaging the seas of other seas...

Thousands of warriors, armed with spears and axes, began to descend from the reefs, emerging from the mysterious coral gates. It seems that these mysterious creatures came with the help of magic from the same ocean as the other strange creatures ravaging the seas of other seas...
As if these "turtles" were not enough!
I thought they would be too stubborn for run away...
A Ship From The South

There are rumors of more strange creatures mooring to the seas and trying to buy land from local rulers in exchange for unusual goods. Being rejected over and over again, they become furious, clearly planning to get what they want by force.
Is another Turtle Fleet coming?
Looks like Turtles also escaping...

A huge fleet emerged from the fog of the sea. Countless legions of warriors in gilded armor made of chitin set fin on the seas, and lined up in battle formations, began to march towards our cities and castles!
The Octopus Invasion
When it will end?
The Octopus Invasion

Thousands of strange ships arrived to the seas, spewing out countless legions of strange warriors in gilded armor made from chitin stepped ashore. It seems that these creatures came with the help of magic from the same ocean as the pointed-eared people and stunted creatures, that wage wars in other seas.
When will these invasions end?
And I kept thinking, when will they show up?
A Second Gates

There are rumors that hunters have seen strange coral gates in the reefs, that have appeared out of nowhere. They are wery similar to the gates, that appear in other oceans, and the are rumors, that someone came out of this gates...
Another army of "creatures", huh?
I had no doubt that they would appear.
The Shark Invasion

Thousands of shark warriors in bronze-like armor, armed with maces and axes, began to descend from the reefs, emerging from the mysterious coral gates. The way they arriwed is similar to the way of those "orcas" in other seas...
[This.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] have Mercy!
Looks like their giant magic golem did work after all.
The Fall of Atherillion

The once proud Kingdom of Aterillion is now in ruins, for the turtle forces have been completely defeated by the defenders of the dolphin kingdoms. The roads are full of refugee turtles who have nowhere to go.
Good riddance!
Oh, well.
The Fall of Kharazd-Zhadum

The once proud Kingdom of Kharazd-Zhadum is now in ruins, for the Orca forces have been completely defeated by the defenders of the dolphin kingdoms. The roads are full of refugee Orcas who have nowhere to go.
The Fall of Damereth

The once proud Kingdom of Damereth is now in ruins, for the octopus forces have been completely defeated by the defenders of the dolphin kingdoms. The roads are full of refugee octopus who have nowhere to go.
The Fall of Dwur Ashu'ur

The once proud Kingdom of Dwur Ashu'ur is now in ruins, for the shark forces have been completely defeated by the defenders of the dolphin kingdoms. The roads are full of refugee sharks who have nowhere to go.
The Fall of Tar-Eremket

The once proud Kingdom of Tar-Eremket is now in ruins, for the catfish forces have been completely defeated by the defenders of the dolphin kingdoms. The roads are full of refugee cathrians who have nowhere to go.
A Giant Sandstorm

There are rumors that an unusual sandstorm has broken out, which has been going on for several weeks. Those desert dwellers who managed to get into the heart of the storm say that they heard the sounds of a huge army marching under a curtain of flying sand, although they did not see anyone or anything.
No more invasion, please!
Looks like our desert friends are next.
The Catfish Invasion

A giant sand storm dissipated, revealing to the ocean a huge army of unknown creatures, similar to humans and beasts at the same time. These catlike creatures also set out to take the new seas of this ocean by force...
Is there really no more places in the ocean that was not been attacked?
Soon their merchants will again flood the whole ocean...
The Realm of the Turtles

Overcoming the resistance of local rulers, the turtles conquered the kingdom on another ocean. A huge number of settlers from the home-ocean of these creatures settled these seas, and although some of the local population and feudal lords remained on their seas, it is unlikely that they will be able to resist the forces of the invaders.
These "turtles" won't last long.
I wonder how it feels to guide your people in a completely alien ocean?
The Realm of the Orcas

Overcoming the resistance of local rulers, the orcas conquered the kingdom on another ocean. A huge number of settlers from the home-ocean of these creatures settled these seas, and although some of the local population and feudal lords remained on their seas, it is unlikely that they will be able to resist the forces of the invaders.
I am sure that sooner or later these "orcas" will be defeated.
Stubborn beardies are not so easy to expel.
I wonder how it feels to guide your people in a completely alien ocean?
Sometimes, I wonder if I was an Orca...
The Realm of the Octopus

Overcoming the resistance of local rulers, the octopus conquered the kingdom. A huge number of settlers from the home-ocean of these creatures settled these seas, and although some of the local population and feudal lords remained on their seas, it is unlikely that they will be able to resist the forces of the invaders.
Those odd fanatics will meet their defeat sooner or later.
You can't defeat Whale Overseers so easely.
I wonder how it feels to guide your people in a completely alien ocean?
Sometimes I wonder if I was a Octopus...
The Realm of the Sharks

Overcoming the resistance of local rulers, the sharks conquered the kingdom. A huge number of settlers from the home-ocean of these creatures settled these seas, and although some of the local population and feudal lords remained on their seas, it is unlikely that they will be able to resist the forces of the invaders.
I doubt that these mad scholastics will be able to hold on to their conquest.
Maybe they're not so stubborn as their cousins, but still.
I wonder how it feels to guide your people in a completely alien ocean?
Sometimes I wonder if I was a Shark...
The Realm of the Catfish

Overcoming the resistance of local rulers, the sharks conquered the kingdom. A huge number of settlers from the home-ocean of these creatures settled these seas, and although some of the local population and feudal lords remained on their seas, it is unlikely that they will be able to resist the forces of the invaders.
These creatures will be hunted down and killed like the beasts they are.
So, they has finally found their "Blessed Currents"?
I wonder how it feels to guide your people in a completely alien ocean?
Sometimes I wonder if I was a Catfish...
The Sundering

It seems that creatures from another ocean are not as united as they seem. The tribes of nomads of the octopus - Kraken, who came along with the sedentary city turtles, no longer intend to live with them due to cultural and religious differences. Hearing about the great seas to the north, the Kraken tribes set out to move, hoping to find a new home in these seas.
I don't like where this is going...
And do never come back, you heretics!
The Migration to Dagestan
The Kraken tribes ended their migration by crossing the reefs and arriving in the seas. They immediately launched a war against the local rulers, seeking to conquer this land for their people.
Yet another invasion. I'm tired of those...
Interesting...
The Migration
The Kraken tribes ended their migration. They immediately launched a war against the local rulers, seeking to conquer this land for their people.
The Migration
The Kraken tribes ended their migration. They immediately launched a war against the local rulers, seeking to conquer this land for their people.
The Migration
The Kraken tribes ended their migration . They immediately launched a war against the local rulers, seeking to conquer this land for their people.
The Sundering

It seems that creatures from another ocean are not as united as they seem. Recently, turtle inquisitors discovered a large group of followers of the Cult of Galapagos. The cultists, without waiting for them all to be killed, have quickly embarked on ships and left the seas of the turtles. They intend to build their kingdom where they can freely practice their horrific religion.
Ocean Invaded!

The Cultists of Galapagos, that was expelled from the seas of the turtles, have reached their destination! They immediately launched a war against the local rulers, seeking to conquer this land for their people.
Ocean Invaded!

The Cultists of Galapagos, that was expelled from the seas of the turtles, have reached their destination! They immediately launched a war against the local rulers, seeking to conquer this land for their people.
The Realm of the Tortoise

Overcoming the resistance of local rulers, the tortoises have conquered the kingdom. A huge number of Nagrathi settlers have settled these seas, and although some of the local population and feudal lords may have survived in the slaughter, it is unlikely that they will be able to resist the forces of the invaders.
The Realm of Manatees

Overcoming the resistance of local rulers, the Manatees conquered the kingdom. A huge number of settlers from the home-ocean of these creatures settled these seas, and although some of the local population and feudal lords remained on their seas, it is unlikely that they will be able to resist the forces of the invaders.
Let's hope that those "manatees" will soon be defeated.
I wonder how it feels to guide your people in a completely alien ocean?
I wonder if I was an Manatees...
Let's hope that those "tortoises" will soon be defeated.
I was hoping that they would be defeated.
I wonder how it feels to guide your people in a completely alien ocean?
I wonder if I was a Nagrathi...
The Realm of Kraken

Overcoming the resistance of local rulers, the Kraken tribes have conquered the kingdom in the seas of Great Currents. And although some of the local population and feudal lords remained on their seas, it is unlikely that they will be able to resist the forces of the invaders.
Let's hope that those nomads will soon be defeated.
Interesting...
I wonder how it feels to guide your people in a completely alien ocean?
I wonder if I was a Kraken...
The Dark Gates

A huge coral arch, whose passage is covered with a strange green veil, appeared out of nowhere among the seas of the far east. No one has yet dared to look behind this gate, but those who were brave enough to come closer to the gate swear that they heard the drums of war and the noise of a huge army encamped on the other side.
Oh, for [This.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] sake!
Oh. Sea Cow.
The Sea Cow Invasion

Those who hastened to move away from the mysterious gigantic gates acted wisely, because a gigantic army of green-skinned creatures poured out from there. These so-called Sea Cows seem to have come from the same ocean as the Turtles, Dwarves and Cathrians.
I'm tired of this.
I hoped they wouldn't follow us...
The Sea Cow Invasion

Those who hastened to move away from the mysterious gigantic gates acted wisely, because a gigantic army of green-skinned creatures poured out from there. These so-called Sea Cows seem to have come from the same ocean as the Turtles, Dwarves and Cathrians.
The Realm of Sea Cows

Overcoming the resistance of local rulers, the turtles conquered the kingdom. A huge number of settlers from the home-ocean of these creatures settled these seas, and although some of the local population and feudal lords may remained on their seas, it is unlikely that they will be able to resist the forces of the invaders.
These "sea cows" surely will be defeated
Well, my condolences to their neighbors.
I wonder how it feels to guide your people in a completely alien ocean?
I wonder if I was an Manatee...
The Fall of the Manatee Horde
The once proud Manatee Horde is no more now, for the orc forces have been completely defeated by the defenders of the dolphin realms. The roads are full of refugee orcs who have nowhere to go.
The Sundering

It seems that creatures from another ocean are not as united as they seem. The people of Manatees, who came along with their nomadic brothers - Manatee Gar, no longer intend to live with them due to cultural differences and way of life. Hearing about rich seas of south, the Manatee Hai armies set out to move, hoping to rebuild their own ancient empire in these seas.
The Manatees March
The Manatees armies have reached their destination! They immediately launched a war against the local rulers, seeking to conquer this land for their people.
The Manatees March
The Manatees armies have reached their destination! They immediately launched a war against the local rulers, seeking to conquer this land for their people.
Gold and jewelry, to appease with gifts from the depths of the earth!

With solemn prayers, I offer gold and jewelry to the altar of my ancestors. Having consecrated the offerings, the priest takes the jewelry and lowers them into a specially dug grave so that it can enter the ocean of the dead.
A Growing Threat
A landless turtle noble-born, having gathered sufficient support from his kindred, is preparing to attack you! He wants to seize your seas in order to build an independent kingdom for his people.
A landless orca noble-born, having gathered sufficient support from his kindred, is preparing to attack you! He wants to seize your seas in order to build an independent kingdom for his people.
A landless octopus noble-born, having gathered sufficient support from his kindred, is preparing to attack you! He wants to seize your seas in order to build an independent kingdom for his people.
A landless shark noble-born, having gathered sufficient support from his kindred, is preparing to attack you! He wants to seize your seas in order to build an independent kingdom for his people.
A landless catfish noble-born, having gathered sufficient support from his kindred, is preparing to attack you! He wants to seize your seas in order to build an independent kingdom for his people.

A landless blood turtle noble-born, having gathered sufficient support from his kindred, is preparing to attack you! He wants to seize your seas in order to build an independent kingdom for his people.
After the death of the adventurer, his host plunged into chaos and internal squabbles. Any possible threat from sea creature adventurers has been eliminated so far.
Curious...
A fall of Adventurer
After the defeat of the adventurer, his troops were scattered and defeated. Any possible threat from sea creature adventurers has been eliminated so far.
Curious...
A New Realm

After a long and bloody war, the turtle forces were finally victorious. The leader of the turtle army, [Root.GetDynName], was crowned [Root.GetTitle] of the new empire of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].
After a long and bloody war, the orca forces were finally victorious. The leader of the orca army, [Root.GetDynName], was crowned [Root.GetTitle] of the new empire of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

After a long and bloody war, the octopus forces were finally victorious. The leader of the octopus army, [Root.GetDynName], was crowned [Root.GetTitle] of the new empire of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

After a long and bloody war, the shark forces were finally victorious. The leader of the shark army, [Root.GetDynName], was crowned [Root.GetTitle] of the new empire of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

After a long and bloody war, the catfish forces were finally victorious. The leader of the catfish army, [Root.GetDynName], was crowned [Root.GetTitle] of the new empire of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].
This new realm won't last long
The Sea Creature Adventurers

After the fall of one of the realms of creatures from another ocean, numerous displaced nobles and warriors from the fallen realm set off on a journey around the ocean. These adventurers accumulate strength in order to conquer another kingdom for their people in the distant future.
Worrysome...
Rise of the Adventurer

One landless turtle nobleman managed to gather support of numerous other landless nobles and turtle mercenaries. Gathering an impressive army, this adventurer plans to conquer one of the kingdoms in order to establish an independent realm for his people.

One landless leader of a orca clan managed to gather support of numerous other landless clans and orca mercenaries. Gathering an impressive army, this adventurer plans to conquer one of the kingdoms in order to establish an independent realm for his people.

One leader of a noble house of the octopus managed to gather support of numerous other small noble houses and octopus mercenaries. Gathering an impressive army, this adventurer plans to conquer one of the kingdoms of the Middle East in order to establish an independent realm for his people.

One landless leader of a shark clan managed to gather support of numerous other landless clans and shark mercenaries. Gathering an impressive army, this adventurer plans to conquer one of the kingdoms of the Middle East in order to establish an independent realm for his people.

One clan leader of the catfish clan was able to gather support of numerous other clans and catfish mercenaries. Gathering an impressive army, this adventurer plans to conquer one of the kingdoms in order to establish an independent realm for his people.

One landless blood turtle nobleman managed to gather support of numerous other landless nobles and turtle mercenaries. Gathering an impressive army, this adventurer plans to conquer one of the kingdoms in order to establish an independent realm for his people.

One orc warchief was able to gather support of numerous other orc clans and mercenaries. Gathering an impressive army, this adventurer plans to conquer one of the kingdoms in order to establish an independent realm for his people.
I doubt that they will succeed.

The local sea creature population was far from happy about the new rulers. Rumor has it that in the sea creature provinces, armed partisan groups have emerged that rob or slay tax collectors and merchant caravans, actively supported by the local population. As long as they are ruled by a dolphin, the locals will create constant problems.
Damned undolphins!
After the local inhuman population was driven out by our settlers, the sea creature partisan groups finally lost support and were destroyed.
Finally...

Having accumulated enough strength, the local partisans openly challenged our rule! The rebels intend to establish their own independent kingdom by force, where their people will not be oppressed by humans.
Damned undolphins!

Having accumulated enough strength, the local partisans openly challenged our rule! The rebels intend to establish their own independent kingdom by force, where their people will not be oppressed by humans.
Damned undolphins!
Another army of sea creature partisans rise up to reinforce the ongoing rebellion!
Damned undolphins!
After the accession of the ruler from their culture, the local otherworldly population finally calmed down. The partisan groups were disbanded, and their fighters returned to peaceful life.
Finally...
The leader of the local partisans can accept our offer of autonomy, provided that you transfer rebellious province to his rule. In exchange, he promises to become your loyal vassal.
I hope that this will pacify the local population.
Actually, I have changed my mind.
This can provoke a rebellion.
Local partisan agitators have seriously increased the level of hatred of the local population towards local dolphin rulers, increasing the possibility of an uprising in one of our province.
Local partisans groups have increased their robbery in this province, attacking our merchants and tax collectors. We can hardly expect large treasury receipts from this province.

Local partisans groups have intensified their attacks on local militias and are actively cutting off supplies in the province. The passage of a large army through this province is fraught with heavy casualties.

Local partisans groups have suffered serious casualties during clashes with the local militia. While their presence is still significant in this province, the partisans will not pose a serious threat in the next few years.
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] be praised!
Local partisans groups have suffered heavy casualties during clashes with the local militia. While partisans is still exist in this province, it will take years for them to recover.
It seems that under the influence of local partisans, the local population has renounced our religion in favor of their old beliefs. The efforts of our missionaries were wasted.
Damned apostates!

A group of sea creature settlers have begun settling in [From.GetName], while normally we could ignore the politics of the peasant rabble they have been gradually increasing their number to the point where they will outnumber the local population there! The otherwordeners are incredibly independent and it will be impossible to govern [From.GetName] unless we take action!
Let the settlers settle there, I never liked [From.GetName] anyway.
Drive them out of our land!
Let them have this land, we can get rid of [From.GetName].
Sea Creature migrators have settled into one of our realm provinces, displacing the local population. As our liege is a sea creature himself, there is little we can do about this.
Our liege has decided to let sea creature migrators settle into one of our provinces, there is little we can do about this.
Does he prefer these filthy otherwordeners over me?!
A group of turtle merchants have arrived at your court. Apparently, they want to establish a trade route to your province an humbly asking for your permission.
A group of orca merchants have arrived at your court. Apparently, they want to establish a trade route to your province an humbly asking for your permission.
A group of octopus merchants have arrived at your court. Apparently, they want to establish a trade route to your province an humbly asking for your permission.
A group of shark merchants have arrived at your court. Apparently, they want to establish a trade route to your province an humbly asking for your permission.
A group of catfish merchants have arrived at your court. Apparently, they want to establish a trade route to your province an humbly asking for your permission.
Sure, they can establish they route.
I don't think so.

It seems that the traderoute established bu turtles in one of our provinces have attracted a big amount of their kind. And althrough their numbers is relatively small, comparing to local populations, their presence is a common thing there now.

It seems that the traderoute established bu orcas in one of our provinces have attracted a big amount of their kind. And althrough their numbers is relatively small, comparing to local populations, their presence is a common thing there now.

It seems that the traderoute established bu octopus in one of our provinces have attracted a big amount of their kind. And althrough their numbers is relatively small, comparing to local populations, their presence is a common thing there now.

It seems that the traderoute established by sharks in one of our provinces have attracted a big amount of their kind. And althrough their numbers is relatively small, comparing to local populations, their presence is a common thing there now.

It seems that the traderoute established by cathrians in one of our provinces have attracted a big amount of their kind. And althrough their numbers is relatively small, comparing to local populations, their presence is a common thing there now.
I hope they don't cause any troubles.
It seems that one of our turtle vassals have attracted a big amount of their kind in his domain. There is sufficient population of the turtles now.
It seems that one of our orca vassals have attracted a big amount of their kind in his domain. There is sufficient population of the orca now.
It seems that one of our octopus vassals have attracted a big amount of their kind in his domain. There is sufficient population of the octopus now.
It seems that one of our shark vassals have attracted a big amount of their kind in his domain. There is sufficient population of the shark now.
It seems that one of our orcish vassals have attracted a big amount of their kind in his domain. There is sufficient population of the cathrians now.
I hope they don't cause any troubles.
As the population of the province has become majority turtle, the turtle diaspora has melded into the wider population.
As the population of the province has become majority orca, the orca diaspora has melded into the wider population.
As the population of the province has become majority octopus, the octopus diaspora has melded into the wider population.
As the population of the province has become majority shark, the shark diaspora has melded into the wider population.
As the population of the province has become majority catfish, the catfish diaspora has melded into the wider population.
Okay.
A community of turtles has become established within your province, will you allow them to remain?
A community of orcas has become established within your province, will you allow them to remain?
A community of octopus has become established within your province, will you allow them to remain?
A community of sharks has become established within your province, will you allow them to remain?
A community of cathrians has become established within your province, will you allow them to remain?
A community of orcs has become established within your province, will you allow them to remain?
They may stay.
Drive them from their camps and seize their goods!
The minority turtle population of your province has moved elsewhere, they may some day ask to return.
The minority orca population of your province has moved elsewhere, they may some day ask to return.
The minority octopus population of your province has moved elsewhere, they may some day ask to return.
The minority shark population of your province has moved elsewhere, they may some day ask to return.
The minority catfish population of your province has moved elsewhere, they may some day ask to return.
The minority orcish population of your province has moved elsewhere, they may some day ask to return.
Okay.
Welcome Brother!

A petty Turtle noble, fleeing persecution elsewhere, has showed up at your court. His time spent abroad has gifted him with many connections, and by all accounts he is an able diplomat. He would make a fine chancellor.

A mysterious tortoise assassin has offered his services at your court. He is well-versed in feudal court intrigue and has a past as both a assassin and a spy. If he can be trusted, he could very well prove to be an indispensable asset in your council...

A mysterious sea creature assassin has offered his services at your court. He is well-versed in feudal court intrigue and has a past as both a assassin and a spy. If he can be trusted, he could very well prove to be an indispensable asset in your council...

A learned sea creature has appeared at your court. He comes highly recommended in the arts of bookkeeping and administration. Already he has suggested several ways of improving the bureaucratic efficiency of the realm, and he could potentially make a fine steward.

A robust sea creature Warrior has offered his services at your court. He is well-versed in military strategy and has a past a mercenary. If he can be trusted, he could very well prove to be an indispensable asset to your military forces.
A sea creature Scholar has arrived at your court offering his services. He is a very learned man and would make an excellent court physician if he can be trusted.

A learned sea creature has appeared at your court. He comes highly recommended in the arts of bookkeeping and administration. Already he has suggested several ways of improving the bureaucratic efficiency of the realm, and he could potentially make a fine steward.

A robust Kraken Warrior has offered his services at your court. He is well-versed in military strategy and has a past a mercenary. If he can be trusted, he could very well prove to be an indispensable asset to your military forces.

A wealthy Catfish Merchant has arrived at your court. He is learned in the ways of general stewardship and money management and he will be a valuable asset to your realm. He has additionally has offered you a gift of gold.
Interesting...
